main.name: Elijah Soladoye
main.description: I'm always ready to build optimized and secure applications that solve problems for you
main.bio: Hello, my name is Elijah Soladoye and I'm a full-stack developer with over four years of experience, proficient in the use of Django, React, and ReactNative, among other technologies, to build applications. I enjoy solving problems, improving customer satisfaction, and collaborating with other developers, and I'm always eager to learn more.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build amazing and impacting stuff, I mean, who doesn't love a good challenge right?, so don't hold back.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I got to pick up.

work.title: Frontend Engineer
work.description: I had the opportunity to work on two projects for this company; The NFT marketplace application and the primary application used for purchasing tickets, displaying events, and containing the user dashboard. I refactored and optimized the codebase and improved a lot of features e.g SSO authentication, state managemnt system, etc

work.title: Full-stack Mobile Engineer
work.description: I assisted in the development of a mobile application that serves as a social media platform for investors.

work.company: Freelance Contract for the Lagos state Governor
work.title: Mobile Developer
work.description: I built an application for a personal function. This app was built for both ios and android. I was able to prevent the installation of unnecessary additional equipments.

work.title: Fullstack web developer
work.description: I built a fullstack web application having features like newsletters, announcements and advertisements.

work.title: Fullstack web developer
work.description: I built a fullstack web application featuring Django, JQuery, Bootstrap, analytics, functional payment system, marketing and email campaigns, authentication and CRUD operations.

projects.title: VoteChain | Voting Dapp
projects.category: A Voting Dapp built with solidarity and NextJS, an app that runs on ethereum blockchain technology.

projects.title: OrderIt
projects.category: A Food Menu and Ordering system targetted for restaurants whereby orders and menus can be managed effectively. Made with Django and React

projects.title: RD Land
projects.category: RD Land is the next-generation of progressive arts and entertainment, radical self-expression, social interactions, and virtual relationships in web 3.0.

projects.title: Spotify Clone
projects.category: Spotify clone built with ReactJS using spotify's API. You can't play song's due to my account not being premium

projects.title: Discord Clone
projects.category: Discord clone built with the MERN stack

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.category: Amazon Clone built with ReactJS featuring Functional components, Hooks, Context API, Firebase and Firestore

projects.title: Covid-19 Tracker
projects.category: A single page app showing records of covid-19 cases around the world featuring ReactJS

projects.title: MarioPlan
projects.category: My first deployed app built with ReactJS featuring Redux, Firebase and Firestore

projects.title: Django | React Ecommerce
projects.category: A django-react Ecommerce app featuring authentication, Cart functionality and Payment systems.

projects.title: PLUV Foundation
projects.category: An actual work in progress for a client, An NGO Website

projects.title: Voting App
projects.category: Voting Website built with Django featuring Chart.js

projects.title: Django | React Blog
projects.category: A simple django-react blog app featuring authentication and CRUD operations using DRF, axios and redux

testimonials.text: In some ways, programming is like painting. You start with a blank canvas and certain basic raw materials. You use a combination of science, art, and craft to determine what to do with them.
Study without desire spoils the memory, and it retains nothing that it takes in.
The most damaging phrase in the language is.. it's always been done this way
